getStatements

public static java.lang.String[] getStatements(java.lang.String dataSourceType)
Returns a list of statements of a given type of data source.

Parameters:
dataSourceType - The type of a data source (file system, data base or sensor net)
Returns:
A list of statements which can be used for the specific data source.

public static java.lang.String[] getStatements(int index)
Returns a list of statements of a given type of data source.

Parameters:
index - of the data source type (file system=0, data base=1 and sensor net=2)
Returns:
A list of statements which can be used for the specific data source.
